mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT_WS('\\n', C.CODE_NM, NULLIF(A.COM_CNTN, '')) AS TITLE , CASE WHEN C.REF_CHR3 = 'WON' THEN CONCAT_WS('/', CONCAT(FORMAT(A.COM_AMT, 0),'원'), NULLIF(C.REF_CHR4, ''), NULLIF(C.REF_CHR5, '')) WHEN C.REF_CHR3 = 'USD' THEN CONCAT_WS('/', CONCAT(C.REF_CHR3,FORMAT(A.COM_AMT, 0)), NULLIF(C.REF_CHR4, ''), NULLIF(C.REF_CHR5, '')) ELSE '' END AS CNTN , CASE WHEN NULLIF(C.CODE_FR, '') THEN CONCAT_WS('/' , '\\n현장지불' , CASE WHEN D.REF_CHR3 = 'WON' THEN CONCAT_WS('/', CONCAT(FORMAT(D.COM_AMT, 0),'원'), NULLIF(D.REF_CHR4, ''), NULLIF(D.REF_CHR5, '')) WHEN D.REF_CHR3 = 'USD' THEN CONCAT_WS('/', CONCAT(D.REF_CHR3,FORMAT(D.COM_AMT, 0)), NULLIF(D.REF_CHR4, ''), NULLIF(D.REF_CHR5, '')) ELSE '' END ) ELSE '' END AS CNTN2 , A.HDNG_GBN , A.PROD_COND , B.ST_DT1 , B.ED_DT1 , B.ST_DT2 , B.ED_DT2 , B.ST_DT3 , B.ED_DT3 , B.BAS_YY_SEQ , C.CODE_FR FROM tb_prod_info A JOIN tb_bas_yy_info B ON A.BAS_YY = B.BAS_YY AND A.BAS_YY_SEQ = B.BAS_YY_SEQ AND (LEFT(B.ST_DT1, 4) = #{currentYear} OR LEFT(B.ED_DT1, 4) = #{currentYear}) JOIN bc_comm_l C ON A.HDNG_GBN = C.CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT AA.BAS_YY , AA.BAS_YY_SEQ , AA.PROD_COND , AA.HDNG_GBN , AA.COM_AMT , BB.REF_CHR3 , BB.REF_CHR4 , BB.REF_CHR5 FROM tb_prod_info AA JOIN bc_comm_l BB ON AA.HDNG_GBN = BB.CODE ) D ON A.BAS_YY = D.BAS_YY AND A.BAS_YY_SEQ = D.BAS_YY_SEQ AND A.PROD_COND = D.PROD_COND AND C.CODE_FR = D.HDNG_GBN WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SSN_GBN = #{ssnGbn } AND C.HEAD_CD = '500000' AND A.HDNG_GBN NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT CC.CODE_FR FROM tb_prod_info AA JOIN bc_comm_l CC ON AA.HDNG_GBN = CC.CODE WHERE AA.BAS_YY = A.BAS_YY AND AA.BAS_YY_SEQ = A.BAS_YY_SEQ AND NULLIF(CC.CODE_FR, '') IS NOT NULL AND CC.HEAD_CD = C.HEAD_CD ) ORDER BY A.HDNG_GBN ASC , A.BAS_YY ASC , A.PROD_COND ASC , A.BAS_YY_SEQ ASC
